name: Super Pixel Ball
description:
Carefully maneuver yourself through the levels, using every ounce of control and precision you have, in this platform puzzle game with slippery marble movement mechanics.

Read a great review of it here:

(check it out at retrogamegeeks)

  • Use a gamepad! (tested with XBOX 360 gamepad)
  • Beautiful low count pixel graphics!
  • 15 awesome levels!
  • Buy me a beer!
